TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Update to every possible GeometricDefinition (LocationType Sub-Types) for an example Facility.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create and update every possible GeometricDefinition for a Facility and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates a Facility LandMinefield with LocationType=PolygonType. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer updates the LandMinefield to LocationType=ArcType. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer continues to update the LandMinefield to all possible LocationTypes and the Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Facility message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Facility is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS for all LocationTypes.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (A) creates a LandMinefield (Facility) with name XXX_LNDMNFLD_5480 and with LocationType=PolygonType:
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Organisation: ITA_ LNDMNFLD_5480
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (B) receive and display the LandMinefield correctly.
